items.sentence: Tom locked the door after he entered his apartment.
Tom dressed himself quickly, then ran out the door.
My driver\'s license is valid for three more years.
My physics teacher doesn\'t care if I skip classes.
If you don\'t like this, you don\'t have to eat it.
Tom is only five, but he already knows how to read.
Tom is only given fifteen minutes to eat his lunch.
Tom is only supposed to have one visitor at a time.
Tom is perfectly capable of taking care of himself.
Tom is perfectly satisfied with his current salary.
